dict.string: The city zoo had 129 animals, 28 new animals were brought in and 12 new lion cubs were born yesterday. How many animals does the zoo have now?

Jenifer works for a moving company and had to move 187 kilograms of her customer's belongings in small boxes and 214 kilograms in large boxes. In total, how many kilograms did Jenifer pack in the boxes?
During the winter, customers buy 286 jackets from a department store. During the rest of the year, they buy 395. How many swim suits are sold overall?
A treasure hunter discovered a buried treasure chest. He opened it up and discovered that it contained 234 diamonds and 666 pearls. How many gems were in the chest?
A company built some new houses in Sunnyvale, painting them with 186 gallons of blue paint and 489 gallons of white paint. How many gallons of paint did the company use?
Over the years, Mitchell's dog chewed through 528 dog bones and 155 stuffed animals. How many toys did the dog ruin?
So far, an orchard has sold a total of 370 pounds of fresh fruit and 549 pounds of frozen fruit this season. In total, how many pounds of fruit have been sold?
A scientist believes that there are 236 small parakeets and 569 large parakeets in a particular part of the rainforest. What is the total parakeet population there?
Mike's car broke and he used $315 from his savings to have it repaired. After that, he had $588 left in savings. How much money did Mike have saved before his car broke?
A dust storm sweeps across the prairie. It covers 385 acres of the prairie in dust, but leaves 140 acres untouched. How many acres does the prairie cover?
